createIdentity(address,address[],address.return: The EIN of the new Identity.

createIdentityDelegated(address,address,.return: The EIN of the new Identity.

getIdentity(uint256).return: All the information for the Identity denominated by the passed EIN.

hasIdentity(address).return: true if the passed address is associated with an Identity, false otherwise.

identityExists(uint256).return: true if the passed EIN exists, false otherwise.

isAssociatedAddressFor(uint256,address).return: true if the passed address is associated with the passed EIN, false otherwise.

isProviderFor(uint256,address).return: true if the provider is set for the passed EIN, false otherwise.

isResolverFor(uint256,address).return: true if the resolver is set for the passed EIN, false otherwise.

isSigned(address,bytes32,uint8,bytes32,b.return: true if the signature can be verified, false otherwise.

params.resetResolvers: true if the destroyer wants resolvers to be removed, false otherwise.

A recovery address to set for the passed EIN.

removeAssociatedAddress().notice: Allows an associated address to remove itself from its Identity.
